content:
@klonos I'm going through the logs on a site I'm working on and see a lot of devel warnings. That led me down a little rabbit hole to your comment here, asking for a nudge to make a new release of devel... nudge :stuck_out_tongue_wink:

"Parameter must be an array or an object that implements Countable" · Issue #44 · backdrop-contrib/devel
I get this warning every time I use dpm(): Warning: count(): Parameter must be an array or an object that implements Countable in dprint_r() (line 1697 of /[SNIP]/modules/devel/devel.module). Resea...

Sure. I have been testing the dev version of the module for a few months now, but I would like some others to have tested and reported no issues before I make a release. Can you please try that for a week or so and let me know if you spotted anything wrong?

I've provided some feedback and a PR for https://github.com/backdrop-contrib/devel/issues/42

Notice: Array to string conversion in devel_is_compatible_optimizer() · Issue #42 · backdrop-contrib/devel
I get 8 of these each time I enable/disable theme debug: Notice: Array to string conversion in devel_is_compatible_optimizer() (line 1140 of /var/www/modules/devel/devel.module).
